Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory699.jpg'}
{3: 'Three hours passed after Gray Raven received the mission to support and rescue Lucia.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory351.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Asking too many questions is not going to do you any good. You should stay out of this.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Actually, while I was in the coma...', 3: '12'}
{2: 'I saw a research institute from the perspective of someone else.', 3: '13'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Keep speaking.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'After matching the coniferous forest and landscape against the satellite map...', 3: '17'}
{2: 'We have located the approximate position.', 3: '18'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'What do you think about that perspective?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm guessing it's from Ascendant Alpha's point of view.", 3: '20'}
{2: 'I had a similar experience before.', 3: '22'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: '...Wells was right. You are just a magnet for trouble.', 4: '1'}
{2: "How's Lucia now...?", 3: '24'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "The Science Council believes Lucia was affected by Alpha's M.I.N.D. activity signals. They are using this connection to search for this signal source.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Put Gray Raven in this operation then.', 3: '26'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "I didn't want to tell you because I didn't want you to get involved again.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Now, give me a reason why you must step into this mess.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'First, if the signal really came from Alpha...', 3: '30'}
{2: 'Gray Raven would be the best candidate, given that they have fought her many times and are now equipped with the latest specialized frames.', 3: '31'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "I'll take that as a reason, but not good enough. Gray Raven is not in the best shape now that Lucia is out of combat.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "The power armor is meant to provide commandants with bonus protection so they don't get killed in battles, especially for some younger ones who are always reckless.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Don't ever think that you can make up for the missing Constructs, let alone that she is a specialized frame.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "The second reason is, Kurono still hasn't given up on me.", 3: '36'}
{2: 'So why don\'t we just get a little more of their "attention"?', 3: '37'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Hmph. Good that you know it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "...Alright, since you are already prepared to become a bait, I won't say no.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory699.jpg'}
{3: 'You arrived at the destination in a shuttle. After discussing with Liv and Lee, you decided to split up for the best rescue efficiency.'}
{3: 'The snowstorm hinders your vision and slows you down, as you have to constantly watch out for the landscape under your feet.'}
{3: 'You continue to walk through the storm, trying to find a place with good visibility to look for shuttle debris.'}
{2: 'AI', 3: 'Biosignal approaching.'}
{3: 'You look at the direction pointed out by the AI.'}
{3: 'A vague figure appears in the storm, giving you a familiar feel. A word slips out of your lips.'}
{3: 'The figure halts slightly, then walks over.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Ui/Spine/UiSpine/UiMovieSpine/UiMovieLuxiya2S/UiMovieLuxiya2S01/UiMovieLuxiya2S01.prefab'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "You're finally here. If you come a little later, I'll have to send her somewhere else."}
{3: "The black-haired girl quietly lies in Alpha's arms. There are not many marks on her frame, but her face rarely looks so exhausted."}
{3: "Keeping a close eye on Alpha, you press the button to call for assistance while checking Lucia's condition through M.I.N.D. Connection."}
{3: 'Alpha remains silent, with no intention to stop you.'}
{2: 'The blocker of her Inver-Device... Is it damaged?', 3: '62'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "She doesn't need it anymore."}
{2: 'Why?', 3: '64', 4: 'Why would I believe you?', 5: '65'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "Ask her when she wakes up. You'll trust her words better."}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "It's up to you."}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: '【kuroname】...'}
{3: 'Alpha looks over. You notice that she is no longer covering her left eye.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "You know what happened to her, don't you?"}
{2: 'I know it very well.', 3: '70'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "Can't believe they didn't hide it from you this time... No, someone must have leaked the information to you."}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'They surely "trusted" you a lot.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'What would you do if they were to seal her up?'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "I'll carry on fighting for her.", 3: '75'}
{2: 'So she can see the situation getting better upon her return.', 3: '76'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Are you so sure that you can survive till that day?'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "If I can't make it...", 3: '79'}
{2: 'She can witness it for me.', 3: '80'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Is that so?'}
{3: 'Her fierce gaze pierces through the storm and your exoskeleton armor, as if she will see through your heart.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Do you know that... To some people, protecting a Corrupted Construct can be seen as a sign of defecting?'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'The choice I made was never meant to just impact the present.', 3: '85'}
{2: 'I want more than just a result.', 3: '86'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "What's the future world like in your vision? Will it regain the glory of the Golden Age?"}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'I hope it can be a little better than that.', 3: '90'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'A little better...'}
{3: 'After a brief moment of silence, Alpha passes Lucia to you.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Take her.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory699.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You hold Lucia firmly and find out she has a storage unit in her hand.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "It contains the records of Project Winter. Haven't you been investigating it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "I already have what I want and don't care about the rest.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'And since you are taking action to bring another possibility into practice, it would be a shame if you keep repeating the past mistakes.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "You can't stay ignorant if you want to uphold your beliefs.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'But knowing the truth also means peering into the abyss. Are you truly ready?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I won't go on that path.", 3: '106'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Is that so?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Then struggle with all your might. Even if only one can reach the finishing line...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "I'd also like to see how far you can go.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'What are you going to do next?', 3: '112'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Your members are here. Go.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alpha looks into the distance beyond the snowstorm.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "We have our own paths to walk. It's not the time for them to cross yet.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Before that, I suggest you focus on things beyond the reach of the other agent and the Tower.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What do you mean?', 3: '118'}
{3: 'Alpha seems to have lost interest in explaining. She turns away and disappears in the storm alone.'}
{3: 'You hear rushed footsteps from behind.'}
{3: 'You turn around and see your members quickly running to you, along with some Purifying Force members who seem to be heavily wounded.'}
{2: "All good. Let's go back."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory53.jpg'}
{3: 'Lucia finds herself in an empty hall. There are no people nearby, not even a sound. Only pale light shines on gray metal walls to reflect her shadow.'}
{3: 'The vast emptiness brings her a level of anxiety that she has never felt before. She cannot help but retreat to the corner.'}
{3: 'The white light feels heavy and suffocating.'}
{3: 'The light seems to have its own will. The more she tries to move back into the shadow, the more closely it follows, mercilessly exposing her.'}
{3: '"Sample for observation", "the key to capturing the Punishing Virus", "key subject"...'}
{3: 'Ever since learning the truth, she has become used to these comments.'}
{3: 'At least...'}
{3: 'She touches her palm as if she can feel the familiar warmth... When she held that hand, it pulled her out of the void.'}
{3: 'That person gave meaning to her life. For the first time, she felt connected to the world... It all started with their encounter.'}
{2: "Nikola's Voice", 3: 'Have you arranged a commandant for ■■■? Better get it done before the activation program.'}
{3: 'She suddenly hears a discordant voice in her memory. Her palm begins to feel cold.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Already done.'}
{2: "Nikola's Voice", 3: 'Yeah, the surveillance on her takes top priority. Get her a smart commandant.'}
{2: '???', 3: "Don't worry. We picked a great graduate after many rounds of selection."}
{3: 'Her precious memories begin to crack like a mirror. She grasps her own hand, her metal joints squeaking in terror. Is this what she has always been fearing?'}
{3: 'If meeting each other was also a carefully arranged coincidence, what else would be left in her?'}
{3: "No. After she had learned that person's way of thinking and doing things, she realized that person had never lied to her."}
{3: 'She desired to get closer to that person. Her feelings were genuine. These bonds were not fake.'}
{3: 'So, even if...'}
{2: "Nikola's Voice", 3: 'Someone took it first?'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Um... My bad. I thought nobody would pick an incomplete squad.'}
{2: '???', 3: "But don't worry, I had already put ■■■ into hibernation in the name of frame maintenance. We can transfer her to the care of one of our people later."}
{2: "Nikola's Voice", 3: 'Who took the squad?'}
{2: '???', 3: "Here's the information."}
{2: "Nikola's Voice", 3: 'Tch, not again.'}
{2: "Nikola's Voice", 3: 'Nothing. Just a graduate who refused the transfer order.'}
{2: "Nikola's Voice", 3: 'Let it be.'}
{2: "Nikola's Voice", 3: 'I say just let this one be the new commandant of Gray Raven.'}
{2: "Nikola's Voice", 3: 'Hah. I wonder what the Chief of F.O.S. will bring for us.'}
{3: 'Turns out... There was never any carefully arranged coincidence...'}
{3: 'The light no longer feels cold, but warm.'}
{3: 'Instead, that person has probably saved her from another emptiness.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'The new Chief of F.O.S... Oh, I remember.'}
{3: 'The name is...'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory524.jpg'}
{3: 'Calibrating the vision module took Lucia some time. She finds the ceiling somewhat familiar.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant... Where are we?', 4: '1'}
{2: "You're in the Construct department of Star of Life.", 3: '178'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Star of Life... Oh! How's your injury, Commandant?", 4: '1'}
{2: "The wound wasn't deep. I'm already fine.", 3: '181'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Thank goodness... And sorry.', 4: '1'}
{2: "It wasn't your fault. Besides, you already pushed me away.", 3: '184'}
{3: 'Lucia tries to sit up, but fails to do so due to the fatigue in the frame and a sharp pain in her mind.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "Don't push yourself too hard. Your frame was badly damaged.", 3: '188'}
{2: 'Not to mention your M.I.N.D. It needs multiple repair sessions.', 3: '189'}
{3: 'She tries to feel her frame. This time, the fatigue is slightly different from the past injuries.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Frame damage is probably not the sole reason for my fatigue...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'I will prove your innocence.', 3: '194'}
{3: "Seeing the human's serious face, Lucia smiles. She is about to say something when the ward's door is suddenly opened."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: '【kuroname】, the visiting time is over. You need to go.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Can I have a little more time?', 3: '201'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "She's still under observation. There is no room for negotiation. Your understanding is appreciated.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, can you help me say "I\'m back" to Liv and Lee?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia waves goodbye to the human and watches the ward door close again.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'We have finished the inspection of this thing. You can have it back now.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Lucia's terminal?", 3: '216'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'Apart from one new message, there is nothing special. A decision has been made to return it to her commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'Once again, I would like to thank Gray Raven on behalf of my squad.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'It was Lee and Liv who found you.', 3: '220'}
{2: 'You should thank them.', 3: '221'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'I will.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory284.jpg'}
{3: 'Among the crowd, a girl Construct has come to the front desk of a hospital.'}
{2: 'Receptionist', 3: 'Hi there. What can I do for you? Are you looking for the Construct department?'}
{2: 'Girl Construct', 3: 'No.'}
{3: 'The girl shakes her head. Her presence is so weak that it feels like she will disappear into the crowd in the next instant.'}
{2: 'Girl Construct', 3: 'Could you please tell me... Where is Mr. Kugawa Kurono?'}
{3: 'Someone is gazing upon her from not far behind, but she has not noticed it.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory328.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lilith', 3: "That was it. She didn't seem to be interested in joining us. In fact, she was strongly against it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'Did you also see this coming, Mr. Vonnegut?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He did not answer.'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: "Why did you set a test that I wouldn't be able to pass? That was harsh.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Not really. I now have a basic understanding of their purpose and abilities. More importantly, I needed to confirm whether she would interfere with our upcoming plan.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "Besides, that would make you work even harder to complete the other task, don't you think?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lilith opens her palm. A storage unit lies on it.'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: "I wouldn't be able to catch it from the endless sea of data if my dear auntie didn't generously share the key with me.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vonnegut takes the storage unit from Lilith. He puts it in front of his eyes, admiring it like a piece of treasure.'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: "Pardon my rudeness, but there is a small question I'd like to ask. What do you plan to do with this sample?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "There's a promise from long ago that I need to honor.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'You did well in the test. We are almost ready to awaken Cthylla.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'What about the Forsakens? Shall we keep going?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'Their leader is quite sharp. He has already begun investigating.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "No need to worry. They won't have time for us.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'Are you talking about those deserters from Babylonia?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Not only them... Well, to a certain extent, all the events and conflicts can be attributed to one thing to begin with.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory31.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Watanabe looks at the newly piled-up mound in front. He puts a paper flower on it.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "We wouldn't be able to stop the kidnapping without the intelligence you sent us, Watt, Walker.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Your sacrifice will not be in vain. One day, the original orders will be restored on this land.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe looks up. Old and new burial mounds line up in the cemetery, with paper flowers on each of them.'}
{3: 'The ashes of the sacrificed merge with the sand under the mounds, returning to this land.'}
{3: "He remembers everybody's name here. Nothing is forgotten."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'll see you later. Next time, I will bring some good news.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe rises to his feet and leaves the small cemetery.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'Boss, we have more newcomers.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Help them settle down first. Don't forget to verify the identities.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: "Got it... But I'm afraid we don't have enough people to train them. I mean, we aren't much better than new recruits ourselves. It would be quite a challenge for us to take care of so many newcomers.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'll go to the training camp myself. Another senior of mine will also come to help them train.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'Your senior? I thought you were senior enough, Leader.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Of course.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I respect him a lot.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Watanabe said with a complex look, but he did not reveal that person's name."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Is there anything else I need to know?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: "Um... It's about the Clean Zone. Babylonia has sent someone here again.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's only a matter of time before they come again. I just didn't expect them to be so impatient.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Where are they now? Take me to them.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory463.jpg'}
{3: 'The closed doors of the Science Council are now open.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosa', 3: 'Oh, hello, 【kuroname】.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "This isn't your appointment time.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'I was just passing by and wanted to say thank you.', 3: '290'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Lucia's situation was the Science Council's responsibility. I just did what I should.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'You did more than that.', 3: '292'}
{3: 'Hearing your words, Asimov could not help but stop.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Go to the archives room. I want a copy of all the records related to M.I.N.D. overload in the experiments of Hyperreal.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Slightly anxious, Rosa rushed out immediately. "When will I get to finish going through so many records?" She mumbled.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'When did you guess that?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'During the conversation just now.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: '...Right. I was the one who added the encrypted comms address.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'So, why are you here?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Just to say thank you.', 3: '312'}
{3: "You put a storage unit in Asimov's hand."}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "What's this...", 4: '2'}
{3: "Asimov's pupils contract slightly. He has obviously guessed something."}
{2: "It's a record of the experiments in Fort Winter.", 3: '317'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'You should submit it to Commander Nikola.', 4: '2'}
{2: "It's just a backup.", 3: '320'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Why did you do that?', 4: '2'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'You have always stayed neutral. For you to do something so risky...', 3: '323'}
{2: 'There must be something that you really want.', 3: '324'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "...I'll take it for now.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Can I ask a question?', 3: '328'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Bring it on.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'What will you do with this data?', 3: '330'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "...Whether it's the army or Kurono, they always withhold some information when sharing it with the Science Council.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Not to mention their real purpose is to use the information to advance their plans. In a way, it makes the Science Council their accomplice.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Perhaps President wants to stop Project Winter through politics, but as long as someone still hopes to exploit this project for their own good, it will only be a matter of time before it is restarted.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Are you trying to end Project Winter completely?', 3: '334'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Right, but in a scientific way.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'The only way to completely crush their hope is to prove it is wrong from the roots.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Which is why this complete information comes at just the right time.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'What about you? What is your goal?', 4: '2'}
{2: "I don't want to see the same things happen again.", 3: '339'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory105.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'This is Lucia from Gray Raven. The following recording is not subject to any form of coercion or interference. It is entirely of my own volition.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'My frame has developed unprecedented abnormal symptoms, which even caused me to hurt my commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Based on the message left by the escort team and my own evaluation, I cannot guarantee when I will go completely out of control before the problem is resolved.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'In order to avoid irreversible consequences and prevent innocent people from being hurt, before I can fix this issue of myself...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I, Lucia, would like to step down as the Captain of Gray Raven.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I know this terminal will probably be discovered by the Purifying Force team who escorted me. If you can, please pass my words to Lee, Liv and my commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I will safely return... No matter how long it will take me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's all.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory463.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You tightly grip the terminal, which is already getting warm in your pocket.'}
{2: 'We in the same team now?', 3: '361'}
{3: 'You reach out to Asimov.'}
{3: "After a brief moment of hesitation, Asimov's hand grasps yours. It feels a little cold."}
